radiographic_examinations.findings: Gallbladder moderately distended with layering echogenic material consistent with sludge; gallbladder wall not thickened; no definite gallstones; trace perihepatic fluid; mild intrahepatic ductal dilation; common duct measures 1.1 cm; no evidence of choledocholithiasis; discrete hyperechoic shadowing foci within fundus of gallbladder possibly representing gallbladder polyps measuring approximately 2 mm; no focal liver lesion; right kidney shows no hydronephrosis; pancreatic duct measures 3 mm.
